title: Flint Murder Crisis: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode
itunes:title: Flint Murder Crisis: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode
description:
Langston and David answer a listener's email about the lack of coverage on the Flint stabber on popular true crime podcasts because the victims were Black.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
